ModMetaData.name: Medieval Overhaul: Arcane Archaeologists
ModMetaData.author: Ogam
ModMetaData.description: Step into the world of 'Arcane Archaeologists!\nhis mod adds a variety of new magical weapons, including swords, staffs, spears, and handgonnes that will give you an edge in battle. Additionally, new armor types that can be recolored at the dye station, to match your colony's aesthetic. But that's not all, this mod also introduces a new house faction of powerful magic wielders\nJoin the ranks of the prestigious explorers guild, and master the art of magic in RimWorld with the 'Arcane Archaeologists' mod!
